programme.desc: Nicole finds her life changed by a secret admirer's letters bearing lavish gifts and strange instructions.

programme.title: For the Love of Lily
programme.desc: A career-minded city girl must build a garden with a plant-loving country boy to appease her boss.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: It's the day of the Gamma Fair, but Sarah doesn't want to go. Bundy rescues Kappa Psi Psi's bachelorette auction, but pays for it later.

programme.title: Let Love Grow
programme.desc: Landscape architect Evie meets her match with new client Ryan, whose daughters are her biggest fan.

programme.title: JK's House
programme.desc: At JK’s House, Dr. Amber Jenkins and JK blend family values, life lessons, music, and dance.

programme.title: Fatal Performance
programme.desc: A struggling actress is hired to impersonate a woman for a business meeting, but soon finds her life in danger.

programme.title: Inspiring Love
programme.desc: When Isla’s art unexpectedly sells to Mark, a second commission sees them falling in love.

programme.title: Campus Caller
programme.desc: When a university student goes missing, her mother a former cop goes in search for her.

programme.title: WWJD2 The Woodcarver
programme.desc: A troubled teenage boy helps an aging wood carver finish an impossibly difficult job.

programme.title: Cowboy & Indiana
programme.desc: With new found hope, former world champion bull rider is given a dangerous shot to regain his former glory.

programme.title: About Scout
programme.desc: A rebellious Goth girl takes a road trip across Texas with a suicidal young man to find her little sister.

programme.title: Master With Cracked Fingers
programme.desc: Young Jackie was intrigued by Kung Fu since an early age, but his father strictly forbade its' practice. One day he met an old beggar who offered to teach him to fight. As he grew up, he got better and better, until he was forced to use his new skills against an extortion ring that was threatening his uncle's restaurant.

programme.title: Beware! The Blob
programme.desc: A technician brings a frozen specimen of the original Blob back from the North Pole. When his wife accidentally defrosts the thing, it terrorizes the populace, including the local hippies, kittens, and bowlers.
